body: i cannot get the ladybug definition to accept my grasshopper geometry..i tried to bake it and connect it thru rhino, i made a solid, tried connecting it directly from the definition tried duplicating edges/surfaces..nothing seems to be working..please help

replies.body:
Shilpa,

What are you trying to achieve? In most of the cases you can use sunlight hours study to get the similar results. See this discussion: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/xn/detail/2985220:Comment:1729357](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/xn/detail/2985220:Comment:1729357)

Mostapha

Hi Mostapha,

Am trying to get shadow patterns for my cellular automata generations

Probably uploading your file may be helpful.

-A.
